item.title: TypeScript and Jasmine playground
item.author: panicoenlaxbox@gmail.com (Sergio León)
item.description: The main purpose of this post is to create (with the less number of steps and understanding the whole process) a simple project where we can develop with TypeScript in Node, have tests written with Jasmine, and get code coverage with Istanbul.
